-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Generic KVS API
@package JunkDB-driver-hashtables
@version 0.1.1.0

module Database.Junk.HashTable
newtype HT h k v
HT :: IOHashTable h k v -> HT h k v
unHT :: HT h k v -> IOHashTable h k v
instance (Eq k, HashTable h, Hashable k) => EnumeratableKVS (HT h k v) IO k v
instance (Eq k, HashTable h, Hashable k) => KVS (HT h k v) IO k v
